description: Geometry-based algorithmic design and implementation of 3D modelling tools for Houdini, a graphics software application
Developed isosurface stuffing algorithms in C++ to generate 2D triangle meshes with desired angle distributions
Published results as open source library. Offers various tiling arrangement options, and ability to specify triangle side lengths throughout regions of input signed distance function
Engineered multi-component system to encapsulate algorithm steps and visualize them in OpenGL
Created C# scripts for .NET CLI to execute customizable multiplayer autotests in parallel, analyze output logs to compute results, and queue tasks onto live CI/CD tools
Enhanced REST API and Entity framework backend to support multiplayer test results in SQL DB
Designed and built custom web UI in Typescript and Lit to visualize autotest results. Offers automated navigation for TV display, and manual option for local use
Implemented mechanism to export GPU texture data as PNG in C++, facilitating periodic screenshots during autotests.
Architected core workflows using MVC pattern for C++/Qt desktop application with 500,000+ users
Implemented topological optimization algorithms to generate organic support structures for 3D prints
Streamlined remote print file generation in C++, minimizing application storage increases by 46%
Reduced data fetching latency across applications by 74% by employing AWS S3 as caching mechanism
Reinforced Node.js and AWS (Lambda + EC2) services to support cross-server file relay transfers
Delivered enhancements to a React/Redux application, impacting 100,000+ users
Built a REST API in Go to integrate 1000+ Doordash orders/week with a Postgres backend
Developed end-to-end integration tests for business critical Javascript software using Cypress
Calculated height measurement percentiles within 98% accuracy, employing the WHO LMS model data
Utilized AWS SAM to automatedly email pdfs generated based on dynamic data
